name: Ungra Walker
overview: Ungra Walker is a dungeon-based action roleplaying for up to two players simultaneously. Dungeons are randomly generated every time the players enters one. Select from different characters, including fighters, magicians, thiefs & clerics. Tons of monsters, huge bosses, and hidden items awaits. The game uses a cartoon 3d graphics engine and the camera can be rotate. The gameplay is similar to the classic arcade machine Gauntlet and the game features different kind of weapons and different and customizable characters (male and female ones). For the town part the game use 2d static screens. To enable the second character in the main menu just press select in any gamepad to switch between the character and create a new character for each player.
